DataElement.preferredName: Fluid Intake and Output Assessment Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the fluid input and output assessment was done.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Fluid Intake And Output Assessment Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A continuous amorphous substance that tends to flow and to conform to the outline of its container (i.e., a liquid or a gas).  Also used as an adjective to describe something with properties like that of a fluid._The process of taking in a substance, especially by eating or drinking, or the quantities thereof; admittance of people to a place or organization at a particular time._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Anything coming out of a system._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Executed and carried through to completion.
